name: Bridal shower invitation
description:
Priced per set of 25. Add sets in cart to purchase in increments of 25. (3 sets = 75 invitations)

Throwing a shower for your best friend? Why settle for boring, fill-in-the-blank invitations? Your love for the bride will shine through when you send these shower invitations. 

This bridal shower invitation features a two-toned bride sillhouette graphic that can be customized to your event. It is printed on a metallic ecru paper, and uses coordinating layered paper. This design comes with blank metallic ecru envelopes and measures 5x7".

Upon purchase, you will receive communication from me within 24 hours to confirm your order and provide your wording and color choices. You must respond to this email to complete your purchase.
